description:
A sword given to you by the Solus Town Village
Headman. It's light, making it easier to wield.
name: Squire Sword
note:
<Can Sell>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A simple wand created by Matilda. It's pretty
much just an enchanted stick.
name: Apprentice Wand
note:
<Can Sell>
<Weapon Image: 39>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Mage
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A well-carved wooden staff. It's not too strong,
but it makes a good first cleric's weapon.
name: Training Staff
note:
<Can Sell>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Cleric
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A dagger handcrafted by a rogue. It's lacking
in strength, but easy to conceal... huh?
name: Novice Dagger
note:
<Can Sell>
<Equip Requirement>
class: Rogue
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A small, cheap sword. An asset for any traveler
that doesn't have access to better weapons.
name: Traveler Sword

description: It's a soldier's spear. What more is there to say?
name: Soldier's Spear
note:
<Equip Requirement>
class: Soldier
class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>

description:
A basic wand useful for magic learners, although
it looks remarkably similar to a normal stick.
name: Traveler Wand
note: <Weapon Image: 39>

description:
A small axe that is easy to wield and is mainly

class: Knight
</Equip Requirement>
